extra.title: mastery
extra.content: Main statistic, we will seek to have as much as possible

extra.title: haste
extra.content:
This build is based in hit strongly with critic Obliterates. And because of being a build with two handed weapons, the speed of the base attacks are slow. That's why improve the attack speed with haste is mandatory.
 The most important part, it will be during the Obliteration phase and the death knight must have between 35-65% os haste during those phases, in order to spam critics with Obliterate

extra.title: critic
extra.content:
This statistic would be less important, because Obliteration phase it creates a lot of Killing Machines. 
 But, generate some critics outside the Obliteration phase might be better than gives extra damage to the critics inside the Obliteration

extra.title: versatility
extra.content: Less important secondary, it will be only choose, if we haven't other better options

content.title: might-of-the-frozen-wastes
content.content: Increases the damage of Obliterate with two handed weapons in a 30%. Moreover, increases the chance to critically hit with auto attacks

content.title: killing-machine
content.content: Critically hits with auto attacks provokes that the next Obliterate will be critic and does frost damage.

content.title: obliteration
content.content: Meanwhile Pilar of Frost is active, Frost Strike and Howling Blast always trigger Killing Machine. Also, has a 30% to generate a rune

content.title: rime
content.content: Obliterate has a 45% to provoke the next Howling Blast to deal 300% damage and no cost rune

content.title: inexorable-assault
content.content: Every 8 seconds gives an accumulation up to 5. Every accumulation gives extra frost damage to an Obliterate

content.title: avalanche
content.content: Howling Blast deals extra frost damage

key.title: Obliterate
key.content:
Basic physical strike of the frost death knight. When Killing Machine is active, it deals always a critically hit and the damage is frost. Dealing super strikes with a lot of damage.
 That's why, we will search ways to improve that strikes

content.title: pillar-of-frost
content.content: This skill will increase the strength a lot and triggers the Obliteration mechanic. Provoking basic skills of the death knight will trigger a Killing Machine

others.subtitle: Skills that generate Killing Machine during Pillar of Frost
